```{r}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
raw <- readRDS("./make_years/n1_n2_cleaned_cases.RDS") 
```

```{r}
p1 <- raw %>% ggplot() +
  geom_line(aes(x = date, y = new_cases_clarke))+
  transition_reveal(date, keep_last = FALSE) 
p1
```
